description: Interacting with the probationers, the Prime Minister exhorted them to keep a sense of trust for the people of India, in course of their work. He said an overwhelming majority of people in the country are law-abiding, and wish to comply with laws in the interest of the nation. He said the honest tax…
caption: t.co
message: A lively interaction with young IRS officers. Emphasised on upholding people's trust in course of their duty. http://pmindia.gov.in/en/news_updates/pm-exhorts-irs-probationers-to-trust-the-people/?comment=disable
